articles.content: Malayalam superstar Mammootty's blockbuster hit movie 'Bramayugam' is set to make its digital debut on the OTT platform SonyLIV on March 15, much to the excitement of fans eagerly awaiting its releas… [+913 chars]

articles.title: Imran Khan confirms he’s dating Lekha Washington, discards narrative of her being the ‘homewrecker’: ‘We grew close after separation from Avantika’ - The Indian Express
articles.description: Imran Khan confirmed that he is dating Lekha Washington, and the actor shared that they grew close a year after his separation from ex-wife Avantika Malik.
articles.content: Imran Khan has been on an acting hiatus since 2015’s Katti Batti,but in the last few months, there has been a renewed interest in the actor. Imran, who separated from his ex-wife Avantika Malik in 20… [+1969 chars]
